section_eight_text: Our collection of testimonials is proof of our commitment to our clients. We are proud to have helped so many companies with their data compliance needs.
section_five_text_one: Select the level of your business Start-up, Micro or SME, and enjoy a wide range of services.
section_five_text_two: Can't find your level of business? Book a meeting below and let's evaluate a plan that will add the most value to your business.
section_five_text_services_one: We have a wide range of services that all combined cover the entire GDPR compliance framework. We offer services as subscription, add-ons to your subscription and one-time purchases.
section_five_text_services_two: You can start with only one service! As you evolve your business, you can add more services to your compliance framework. If you start with more than 3 services, get in touch with us to receive your special discount!
section_five_subtitle_services: Mix and match your own GDPR compliance!
section_five_title: Ready to go in just three clicks
section_form_contact_text: Feel free to reach out to us with any inquiries, concerns, or assistance you may require. Our team is here to help and eager to hear from you!

section_form_text: At Nordic Data Compliance Centre everything works online. That means, at for you as a consultant in our partnership program, can work where you want, when you want and as much as you want. You need to be a registered freelancer or having your own company with a VAT number. We are looking forward to hearing from you at hello@datacompliancecentre.com
section_four_goals_text: At Nordic Data Compliance Centre, we specialize in simplifying legal and information security complexities for companies. Our passionate and innovative team focuses on creating value for companies by improving their data compliance levels, one company at a time. We prioritize building strong relationships with stakeholders and adopt a proactive approach, taking responsibility for our actions.
section_four_values_text: Data compliance shouldn't hold your business back. We simplify adapt our solutions to your company's evolving needs. We prioritize transparency in everything we do and ensures you're always in control and confident in your compliance strategy. Our scalable solutions are built to grow with you, ensuring your data remains fully protected and compliant with the latest regulations.
section_one_text: Working with GDPR compliance is an ongoing task, often heavily burdensome for companies, especially SME's. Choose Nordic Data Compliance Centre as your strategic partner and you immediately boost your data compliance level, maximize success and stay ahead of competition!
section_one_title: Creating practical solutions within the very complex area of GDPR and Information Security since 2013
section_seven_text_one: Discover a diverse selection of one-time services tailored just for Start-ups, Micro businesses, and SMEs below. From contracts, training, audit to concrete implementation solutions.
section_seven_text_two: Can't find what your're looking for? Book a meeting below and let's find what out what service will add the most value to your business.
section_six_text: Our add-ons to your subscription services ensure a higher level of compliance. In order to add one of the add-ons to your cart, you need to select a service first.
section_three_subtitle: Don't let it slow you down!
section_three_text_three: Each service we offer is designed to deliver maximum value and tailored to your specific industry, whether your're in healthcare, finance, or any other sector.
section_three_text_two: Our team of experienced data compliance professionals brings a wealth of knowledge from both in-house and external consulting roles across Nordics and global companies in both the private and public sectors. We understand the unique challenges faced by each company regardless size and sector.
section_three_text_one: Our focus is on providing practical, cost-effective and based on latest requirements solutions, that help your business achieve and maintain GDPR compliance.
section_two_title_1: Solution based on best practice across Nordics
section_two_title_2: Data compliance with a practical approach
section_two_title_3: Comply with EU and local legislation
